title: The 2025 CSO-UN Dialogue on Peacebuilding: from regional insights to global action
content:
CMI co-chaired the 3rd iteration of the annual global CSO-UN Dialogue on Peacebuilding in 2025. The Dialogue aims to strengthen the strategic and operational partnership between the United Nations and civil society across the peacebuilding spectrum. In 2023, the United Nations (DPPA/PBSO) established the CSO-UN Dialogue on Peacebuilding to provide more systematic entry points for [â€¦]
The post The
creator: Peter Seenan
